title: How to access main menu (with all the apps) without having to scroll up twice?
content:
I've just gotten the pixel 3a and i'm getting really annoyed at how I have to swipe up twice to access the main menu with all the apps. If I swipe up once its the 'suggested' apps but I have to swipe up again to see all the apps.
Am I missing something here? Is there a way to get rid of this annoying extra step?
